overview: When they have no one to pass their "mutya" forward so they can finally die, aging "aswangs" in Antique are believed to seek for the mystical lake in Negros where they can just turn into ashes and disappear forever.  This is the story of a 78 year old aswang and the young man who helped her find the lake.

production_companies.name: National Commission for Culture and the Arts

title: Dandansoy
